DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , multicenter , bilaterally-treated , open-label , non-randomized clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective S & E Study Wavefront-guided PRK Myopia With iDesign Advanced Wavescan Studio™ System Star S4 IR™
